attributes.description:
MAKE: BMW 420D GRAND COUPE




ENGINE CAPACITY: 3.0 DIESEL




MODEL: 2014




COLOUR: BLUE 




TRANSMISSION: AUTOMATIC WITH PADDLE SHIFT




KILOS: 159000KM




SERVICE HISTORY: YES




SPARE KEYS: NO









EXTRAS:




ELECTRIC WINDOWS, POWER STEERING, AIRCONDITIONING, RADIO CD NAVIGATION, MULTI FUNCTION STEERING, MAGS, XENON HEADLIGHTS, SUNROOF, M4 BUMPER, LEATHER SEATS




























 




 
ONLY CASH AND EFT
TRADE INS ACCEPTED 
STRICTLY NO FINANCE

WE HAVE 3 BRANCHES FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE PLEASE CONTACT US TO CONFIRM LOCATION OF YOUR DESIRED VEHICLE!

 

MONDAY TO FRIDAY: 8AM TO 5PM
SATURDAY:8AM TO 1PM








































THIS IS AN AUTHENTIC AD WITH A REPUTABLE DEALER. PLEASE BE AWARE OF SCAMS WITH FRAUDSTERS USING OTHER ADVERTISERS PHOTO’S. DO NOT PAY OVER ANY DEPOSIT’S UNLESS YOU HAVE CONFIRMED THE VEHICLE EXISTS DUE TO EXTENSIVE FRAUD!!
